item.title: Jira recipe
item.description: This instruction assumes that Jira is installed in /opt/jira and the data directory is /var/jira. The installation is on Ubuntu Linux but should also work on other flavours of Linux. Jira requires a supported database, in this instruction I assume that the database is already configured.
